title: Pseudo-martyr Wherein out of certaine propositions and gradations, this conclusion is euicted. That those which are of the Romane religion in this kingdome, may and ought to take the Oath of allegiance.
author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.
publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Walter Burre,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
